articles.author: SHEIKH SAALIQ
articles.title: How did a killing at a Sikh temple lead to Canada and India expelling each other's diplomats? - The Associated Press
articles.description: Relations between India and Canada are at a low point as the countries expelled each other’s top diplomats over an ongoing dispute about the killing of a Sikh activist in Canada. Canada said it had identified India’s top diplomat in the country as a person of…
articles.content:
NEW DELHI (AP) Relations between India and Canada are at a low point as the countries expelled each others top diplomats over an ongoing dispute about the killing of a Sikh activist in Canada.
